managementResponses.response:
We are so glad that you loved our location and how convenient it was for your visit to San Francisco. We agree with you that our hotel is ideally located to the best sights our downtown has to offer. Sports and conventions are just some of the many events that San Francisco plays host to, and we're fortunate to be in the center of it all. We value your business and look forward to your next stay at the Courtyard San Francisco Downtown. 

Best regards,
Jim Shumaker,
Assistant General Manager

review.title: Nice place to visit
review.reviewText: Night construction noisee we enjoyed could not stay longer due to Guns and Roses concert in town price were inflated.
review.positiveRemarks: Centrally located easy to jump on mass transit
review.locationRemarks: Car rental, trolley, bus, taxi $10 to warf should have taken bus.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad you liked our welcoming associates and had a good overall stay. However, we regret that our prices did not meet your expectations. We regularly review our pricing to make sure that we are competitive with hotels in the area. With our excellent location, comfortable rooms and overall commitment to excellence, we hope you will see us as a good value. We appreciate your observation regarding our valet parking service and apologize for any inconvenience it may have caused. Thanks again for your feedback, and we would love to welcome you back soon. 

Best regards, 
Jim Shumaker, 
Assistant General Manager

review.title: Nice place
review.reviewText: Very nice place to stay if you are going to an SF Giants game, although it has gotten very expensive since we first started staying there. In addition, the motel needs to have more valet parking staff on duty on weekends early in the morning when many people are leaving.
review.negativeRemarks: Too expensive. Need more valet parking assistants early in the morning to go get cars for clients who are leaving.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and to acknowledge our staff. Our team will absolutely appreciate your wonderful comments and will be glad to hear that they played a role in making your stay memorable. Thanks again for choosing our hotel, and we hope that you will stay with us again on your next trip to San Francisco!

Best regards,
Jim Shumaker,
Assistant General Manager

review.title: Helpful staff
review.reviewText: I had a late flight and they were able to accommodate me with no problem for late check-ins. They even helped me with a late night snack!
review.locationRemarks: It's San Francisco, baby. There's a lot of things to do.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for staying with us and for the constructive comments provided. Please accept my apologies for the cleanliness issues you encountered with your bathroom and for the inconvenience it caused. We have inspection procedures in place to keep this from happening, so I apologize that we dropped the ball. Please be ensured that our Housekeeping Director is already addressing your concern with the team to make sure that this is not repeated. Your feedback is important to us, and we hope that you will stay with us again. I am confident that you will notice an improvement on your next visit. 

Best regards,
Jim Shumaker
Assistant General Manager

review.reviewText: The tub was slippery & slightly hazardous for seniors.

It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope to have you back with us soon.

review.reviewText: Hotel is close to most of the sight seeing place in San Feancisco. Hotel staff is really friendly

managementResponses.response:

As with most major downtown locations, there is an expense associated with convenient parking, but we continually evaluate our costs and the surrounding market to keep our prices in check. We hope this did not overshadow your otherwise positive stay with us and that you will consider staying at our hotel again in the future.

Best regards,
Jim Shumaker,
Assistant General Manager

review.title: Nice hotel close to AT&T Park
review.reviewText: The only negative is $60 per day valet parking and lack of view of the city.

review.title: Very nice but a little pricey!
review.reviewText: Great hotel and friendly staff.  Close to AT&T Park.  The hotel was a little expensive but wr had great service.

review.reviewText: The Courtyard was a very good hotel accomodation during our stay in Sab Francisco. The staff was friendly and helpful, the lobby and restaurants were really great. Included free wifi which was cool. The room was just slightly outdated abd the bed was okay but could be a little more comfortable. Overall we were quite pleased and would stay again.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for the great review, especially about our location! We are delighted to hear that our enviable downtown location was just what you were looking for. We are very fortunate to be within walking distance to many of San Francisco's most popular attractions, so we appreciate you highlighting the same. We also acknowledge your suggestion in regard to our bathroom in need of revamping. Thanks again, and we hope to have the pleasure of hosting you for all of your future San Francisco visits. 

Best regards,
Jim Shumaker
Assistant General Manager

review.title: Overnighter
review.reviewText: It turned out to be a perfect location for a quick Sat-Sun overnighter. The indoor/outdoor bar/cafe area was a nice plus
review.locationRemarks: Tip: street parking is free and generally available on Sundays

managementResponses.response:

review.title: Extremely Quiet and Clean.
review.reviewText: Very clean. Excellent maid service. We needed the front desk once, for  broken hair dryer, and they had one to our room in 2 minutes. Our room had 2 queen beds and plenty of room. Best feature was the quiet. We never heard any noise from adjoining rooms: no TV or voices or water flow. Also, we never had to wait for any of the four elevators.
review.locationRemarks: Close to baseball park, although we did not go to a game. A block from SFMOMA. Near stores on Market St.

managementResponses.response:

Please be ensured that we regularly review our pricing to make sure that we're competitive with hotels in the area while offering the best value for our guests. Thank you once again, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Best regards,
Jim Shumaker,
Assistant General Manager

review.title: Nice convenient hotel-too expensive
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, very friendly front desk staff.  Too expensive if you only need a room--but they all are. Comfortable and clean- nice laundry for guests.

review.title: what king size bed?
review.reviewText: didn't realize that we were given a room with two beds rather than a king size bed -- not owrth thehassle but disappointed.

review.title: the hotel was very nice
review.reviewText: The only problem I encountered was when I went into my room it stunk from pot! So I immediately went to the front desk and they gave me another room right away that was very good.
review.positiveRemarks: I liked everything about the hotel especially the quietness.
review.locationRemarks: It was not too far from the Wharf and other stores we went to.

managementResponses.response:

review.title: Wonderful staff, Some odd extras though
review.reviewText: OK, so their is a trick to the $65 a day parking. When you book your room, look for a "deal" that includes parking, I saved $25 by doing that. #2, Uber is a BIG help, leave your car at the hotel and use Uber. The amount of $$$ you pay for parking around town will be about the same. The only other thing I would add would be the $22 for breakfast in the morning. They really should offer SOMETHING, but for the price of the stay it might cost them too much, it IS San Francisco after all ;P

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for taking the time to review the Courtyard San Francisco Downtown. We couldn't be more pleased that your stay with us earned the highest rating. We are glad you loved our amenities, and also that our location was convenient enough for you to visit your daughter’s graduation. We appreciate your suggestion regarding the fire pits. It is pleasing to read that everyone had a great time at our courtyard. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback. We hope to serve you again soon.


Best regards,
Jim Shumaker
Assistant General Manager

review.title: Daughters graduation from SFSU
review.reviewText:
Was able to gather my entire family outside in the hotels "Courtyard" for a relaxing champagne toast. 
This all took place in the evening by your fire pits and was very enjoyable by all twenty of us.
review.negativeRemarks: your fire pits should be natural gas, not bottled gas
review.locationRemarks: location was great easy to get around SF

It is also great to read you liked our courteous associates who took great care of you and that you were impressed with all that we have to offer. review.title: Great hotel within walking distance to AT&T park!
review.reviewText: Nice hotel that is convenient to AT&T park. The staff is what makes the difference with this hotel. If an upgrade is available..its offered. If the Giant's game runs over the car pick up time..there's a minimal charge and luggage can be stowed with the front desk after check out. This hotel really accommodates guests and go out of their way to be helpful and suggest opportunities for making your overnight stay and attending a Giants game less complicated.
review.locationRemarks: AT&T park with fun breweries and restaurants walkable.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for reviewing your recent stay - we value your comments!  Please accept my apologies for not meeting your expectations in regard to the condition of your guest room.  We acknowledge it is time for a more modern and updated look and I am pleased to let you know we are working on plans to renovate our guest rooms.  We are looking forward to showcasing our new look and hope to have the opportunity for you to experience those enhancements on a future visit.  

Best regards,
Jim Shumaker
Assistant General Manager

review.reviewText: Nice location and the room was comfortable.  Within walking distance to a number of good restaurants.
